alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Knox (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 30 at 12:13PM EDT until May 31 at 7:08PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Petersburg. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Hazleton. .Rainfall amounts of two to over three inches across southern parts of central Indiana over the last couple of days has produce minor flooding on parts of the lower White River. The rivers have crested and will continue to fall overnight into mid week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Hazleton. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 17.5 feet, Flood water is near or starting on Pottsville Road. Low bottomlands are increasingly affected by flood waters. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 6.3 feet Thursday, June 09. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
